ActionMovies.title: Dead pool 2
ActionMovies.description: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-travelling cyborg, Cable.
ActionMovies.stars: Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin

ActionMovies.title: Mission Impossible Fallout
ActionMovies.description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.
ActionMovies.stars: Tom Cruise, Henry Cayill, Ving Rhames

ActionMovies.title: Ready Player One
ActionMovies.description: When the creator of a virtual reality world called the OASIS dies, he releases a video in which he challenges all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune.
ActionMovies.stars: Tve Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn

ActionMovies.title: Venom
ActionMovies.description: When Eddie Brock acquires the powers of a symbiote, he will have to release his alter-ego “Venom” to save his life.
ActionMovies.stars: Tom Hardy, Michelle Williams, Riz Ahmed
